status_taginfo_hardware.unknown: The hardware's compatibility is unknown and requires you testing
status_taginfo_hardware.compatible: The hardware is compatible with LoongArch platforms and compatible with 'old-world' and 'new-world' distributions
status_taginfo_hardware.partial: The hardware can be compatible with LoongArch platforms but some features are not supported, and may be compatible with both 'old-world' and 'new-world' or only 'old-world' distributions.
status_taginfo_hardware.new_world: The hardware is compatible with LoongArch platforms, but is only available on 'new-world' distributions
status_taginfo_hardware.unsupported: This hardware is incompatible with LoongArch platforms and is incompatible with any 'world' distributions

status_taginfo_software.unknown: The application has not been tested yet
status_taginfo_software.compatible: The application is running normally, and no abnormalities have been found
status_taginfo_software.partial: The application can run, but some features are known to be unavailable or problematic
status_taginfo_software.native: The application already provides native support for LoongArch or offers source code, eliminating the need for LAT translation
status_taginfo_software.new_world: The application already provides a new-world ABI version or offers source code, eliminating the need for packages from the old-world
